document.full_text: the operator of japan's crippled fukushima nuclear plant on thursday detailed a new leak of radioactive water as greenpeace slammed the country's "inadequate response" to a growing threat to sea water and health.
document.title: japan slammed as new leak found at stricken nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: the operator of japan's crippled fukushima nuclear plant on thursday detailed a new leak of radioactive water as greenpeace slammed the country's "inadequate response" to a growing threat to sea water and health.
